channel.title: Fixed how do i get path not specifide no go away when i compile?
channel.description:
my compiler code is
echo off Title building "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
but when i compile it says path not specified what do i do?? or u can realy help by teamviewing me and helping me with my procces

item.title: Fixed how do i get path not specifide no go away when i compile?
item.dc:creator: @Siccc Siccc
item.description:
@Siccc wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:3, topic:309217”]Alright dont do what this kid said. I have a script that will detect JDK no matter what version your have. Here

@echo off @TITLE Digital Dogs if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile cls echo Errors: for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause goto compile exit [/quote]

Both of our ways would have works asshole mines just simpler.

EDIT

Also Momo try putting this in your compiler then

@echo off Title building "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Read full topic

item.source: Fixed how do i get path not specifide no go away when i compile?

item.title: Fixed how do i get path not specifide no go away when i compile?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Alright dont do what this kid said. I have a script that will detect JDK no matter what version your have. Here

@echo off
@TITLE Digital Dogs
if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error)
:compile
cls
echo                                          Errors:
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
:end
echo Finished!
pause
goto compile
exit

Read full topic
item.source: Fixed how do i get path not specifide no go away when i compile?

item.title: Fixed how do i get path not specifide no go away when i compile?
item.dc:creator: @Siccc Siccc
item.description:
@Siccc wrote:

Alright what you do is go into Program files, find your java, look what jdk you have and say yours is

jdk1.6.0_14

Your code in your compiler should look like this

@echo off Title building "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

So change your code to what ever version of JDK you have real simple.

Hope it helped.

Read full topic
